description: The Kuhl Denim Men's Pant is cut from Kuhl's exclusive heavyweight performance denim. Highlighted by impressive stretch and phenomenal rebound, these pants maintain both fit and form over extended wear. With a classic five-pocket design, Kuhl Denim Klassik Fit sports a modern look.
name: Kuhl Kuhl Denim Klassik, 34" Inseam - Mens
